Articles.Content: After a week of failure we just completed our first successful mission. Orbited the planet (kearth?) and returned with the guys still alive. Great fun.

Welcome to the KSP Forums! We hope you don\'t explode.

Happy slamming into the Mun!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Monkatraz

Some Guy Copying Slunky

:U

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

The planet is Kerbin, the star is Kerbol, and the people are Kerbals. 8)

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
